ing: 2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers coconut flavored rum
1 fresh pineapple spear or ring for garnish
des: "Just imagine sitting on the beach in Maui while you're sipping this pretty cocktail."
ins: Measure the vodka, coconut rum and banana liqueur into a cocktail shaker and add a scoop of ice cubes. Cover and shake until the outside is frosty, about 30 seconds. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with a fresh pineapple spear or pineapple ring.
